definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: (ewe, RS:K 219);—Rachel, Raxhl, daughter of Laban and wife of Jacob: Ge 29:6, Ge 29:9, Ge 29:10, Ge 29:11, Ge 29:28, Ge 29:29, Ge 29:30 + 36 t. Gn (JE 37 t., P 6 t.), + ´:([[־]])[[קְבֻרַת]] Ge 35:20 (JE), 1Sa 10:2. (cf. [[אֶפְרָתָה]]
p. 68; on site vid. Dr:Hast. DB RACHEL); ´[[ר]]: (in fig.) Je 31:15; ´[[ר]]: Ru 4:11 (in sim.).
